thread.title: Showing off her ass-ets! Mariah Carey, 46, hits the gym in fishnet stockings and stiletto heels
thread.title_full: Showing off her ass-ets! Mariah Carey, 46, hits the gym in fishnet stockings and stiletto heels

author: irishmirror
title: Showing off her ass-ets! Mariah Carey, 46, hits the gym in fishnet stockings and stiletto heels
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She's known for her diva demands and larger-than-life persona. So it's perhaps not surprising that Mariah Carey decided to hit the gym in a jaw-dropping ensemble on Thursday. 
The 46 year-old, who is never backwards in coming forwards, showed off her generous assets as she squeezed herself into a pair of fishnet stockings and a high-rise leotard for a rather unconventional work-out. 
Proudly displaying her backside as she climbed some exercise stairs, she even teetered along in a pair of 5" stiletto heels - in, of course, bright white patent leather. 
Despite being better suited to the dancefloor, rather than the treadmill, she seemed delighted with her attention-grabbing style and posed up a storm for social media. Mariah Carey raises eyebrows - and temperatures - in the gym (Photo: Instagram) 
Posting the first snap on Instagram, she captioned the cheeky shot 'Climb every mountain' and, naturally, it generated a huge response, with more than 59,000 'likes' in just five hours. 
Hilariously, one fan responded: "Been working out wrong", while another added: "She is so outrageous I love her". 
Lapping up the attention, she then shared a front-facing snap which saw her lifting weights while pushing her ample chest out. 'We must we must ... ;)' she teased, garnering a further 500,000 views. The 46 year-old certainly showed James Packer what he's missing! (Photo: Instagram) The chart-topper was more than happy to strut her stuff (Photo: Instagram) 
A third upload showed her 'running amok', but this attracted less-flattering comments. 
One disgruntled fan wrote: I love Mariah, I went to see her last concert and am a true fan, but this is really ridiculous - it's all that is happening with her right now and is not making sense anymore." 
Not that she's ever really bothered by what other people think. 
The chart-topper is in an eyebrow-raising relationship with dancer and choreographer Bryan Tanaka - who is several years her junior. The pair started dating immediately after she split from billionaire James Packer. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
